title: How to read, understand, and learn new things online - Quora

response.answer_text: I’ll try my best to answer this. In my opinion the best way to learn new things (for free) online, is to learn through Khan academy ( https://www.khanacademy.org/ ). Another way to understand and learn new things, is to read blogs and articles . Finally, one of the best ways to learn something is to watch YouTube videos, whether it’s about engineering, wildlife, business, computers, etc. One can learn a lot from YouTube, and also, watching documentaries is really beneficial too. I hope this helps. Thank you.
